distribution.text: Copyright Â© Red Hat, Inc. All rights reserved.

notes.text:
Updated clutter packages that fix one security issue are now available for
Red Hat Enterprise Linux 7.

Red Hat Product Security has rated this update as having Moderate security
impact. A Common Vulnerability Scoring System (CVSS) base score, which
gives a detailed severity rating, is available from the CVE link in the
References section.
notes.title: Topic

notes.text:
Clutter is a library for creating fast, visually rich, graphical user
interfaces. Clutter is used for rendering the GNOME desktop environment.

A flaw was found in the way clutter processed certain mouse and touch
gestures. An attacker could use this flaw to bypass the screen lock.
(CVE-2015-3213)

All clutter users are advised to upgrade to these updated packages, which
contain a backported patch to correct this issue. After installing the
update, all applications using clutter must be restarted for the update to
take effect.
notes.title: Details

notes.title: Terms of Use

publisher.issuing_authority: Red Hat Product Security is responsible for vulnerability handling across all Red Hat products and services.
publisher.name: Red Hat Product Security

document.title: Red Hat Security Advisory: clutter security update

notes.text: A flaw was found in the way clutter processed certain mouse and touch gestures. An attacker could use this flaw to bypass the screen lock.
notes.title: Vulnerability description

notes.text: clutter: screenlock bypass by performing certain mouse gestures
notes.title: Vulnerability summary

notes.text: The CVSS score(s) listed for this vulnerability do not reflect the associated product's status, and are included for informational purposes to better understand the severity of this vulnerability.
notes.title: CVSS score applicability

remediations.details:
Before applying this update, make sure all previously released errata
relevant to your system have been applied.

For details on how to apply this update, refer to:

https://access.redhat.com/articles/11258

vulnerabilities.title: clutter: screenlock bypass by performing certain mouse gestures
